:::The Protectrons/Torca/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky Lynx/Orion:::

::They hear Iron Raptor's words and keep their weapons down, hoping that this 
battle ends soon, because they are all badly damaged::
Hardhead: You were right boss, the Maximals need us bad. Look at the state of 
things!
Chromedome: Still, dont underestimate them.  Iron Raptor is doing the right 
thing here.

--part1_d1.124465a.2797ad38_boundary
